actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Desiccation Field (1/Day)
actions.desc: Extends its arms sending sand and grit swirling around itself. Each non-qumdaq creature within 10 ft. of it: 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage and suffers one level of exhaustion for 1 hr or until it drinks 1+ pint of water (DC 10 Con half damage and isn't exhausted). A creature can suffer no more than 3 total levels of exhaustion from Desiccation Field regardless of how many qumdaqs use the action.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: Can burrow through nonmagical unworked earth/stone with o disturbing material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Final Gift
special_abilities.desc: When it dies it bursts in a shower of sand. A qumdaq of dying qumdaq's choice within 10 ft. of it regains 5 (2d4) hp or target gains 5 (2d4) temp hp if at its max.

special_abilities.name: Horde Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on attack rolls vs. a creature if 1+ qumdaq's ally is within 5 ft. of creature and ally isn't incapacitated. Also qumdaq's weapon attacks deal extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage on a hit if 3+ qumdaq's allies are within 5 ft. of target and allies aren't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sense Magic
special_abilities.desc: Senses magic within 60' of it at will. This otherwise works like detect magic but isn't itself magical.
